website_summaries.verdict: The Ultrasone HFI-680 headphones' abundant bass power, forgiving treble, and isolation from external noise should make these an attractive choice for some buyers.
pros: Ultrasone's nicely built, full-size, closed-back headphones hush outside noise

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!! :)
customer_reviews.text: BUY IT!!! After spending countless hours researching current market headphones, reading reviews, testing the latest Bose, I can say with a 100% confidence that this set is the best! After breaking it in for roughly 100hrs, the smile I get on my face every time I put them on says it all. Crisp crisp beats!! Drop notes, base, acoustics, vocals are all perfectly calibrated. This is the best present my boyfriend ever bought me. Plus, the price compared to others in the same arena is unmatched! I can't say enough about these headphones! You won't regret it. Just break it in!! Enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Danke Schön, Ultrasone
customer_reviews.text: Ultrasone headphones have their own singular sound and I’m a fan of it. Less fatiguing than other headphones due to their positioning of the drivers, these emit a wonderfully natural sound. Rather than seeming like you’re listening to closed headphones, these feel as if you’re savoring speakers in an acoustically optimized room. I’ve enjoyed a few live recordings that literally did sound truly live thanks to the design of these cans. These headphones also excel when listening to movies, creating a wide auditorium atmosphere. I’ve bought many headphones in the past, but Ultrasone ended my quest for perfection. I reach for these each and every time.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Nice product! I already have DJ1 and I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product! I already have DJ1 and I was searching for something similar. This specific model met my expectations completely. I like a wire extender that I sometimes use to connect headphones to my TV. They allow me to escape from occasionally noisy street/neighbors or maintain silence when I want to watch something during the night. The only problem is a wire length without extender. I feel that it's not long enough for me but anyway it's not a big issue.
customer_reviews.author: Gekz

customer_reviews.title: First headphones I've purchased...LOVE them.
customer_reviews.text: These are the first headphones I've purchased...LOVE them. I did a lot of research and decided on these after reading these suit electronic music well. Couldn't agree more, I feel like these are ideal for EDM/house... they don't sound too great with other music like rock or anything lyric based but for my style of music, I couldn't be happier. Great bass and sounds perfect with electro. Love the comfort too, fit perfect for me. Only question now is if I need a headphone amp or not, I run it out of an HP laptop with the beats audio so I think it gets enough power as is.
customer_reviews.author: HallaDurg

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Positives: Great sound quality Comfortable and not too heavy Short aux cable w/ extension cable Collapsable Carrying case Negatives: The cone design doesn't provide as much noise cancellation as it doesn't fully enclose the ear. It could just be the size of my head and ears. Even so, this isn't that big of a negative. Overall, the sound is excellent on these headphones. My previous pair was a set of Sennheiser Pro HDs, and while they were about the same, if not a little bit better than these Ultrasone, I didn't care for much about them save for the superb sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Kuryliw

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound, but uncomfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound and good build quality. The bass is a little strong for my liking but it's not overpowering. They are, as other reviews have noted, not comfortable for long periods of use. I'm usually taking them off after 60-90 minutes. Overall, they're above average but if I had to replace them it would be with another brand simply due to the comfort issue.
customer_reviews.author: JRausta

customer_reviews.title: Love these - buying second pair as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. I mainly use them for meditation cds/mp3s and with Hemi-sync. My boyfriend is a drummer/musician and has been borrowing them to listen back to his videotaped drum solos and other music. I am getting him a pair as a surprise birthday present since his current headphones are an old pair of Radio Shack. I imagine he will also use them while playing his V Drums now that he will have a pair of his very own.
customer_reviews.author: BTO#1

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, but very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These sound great, but after about 30-45 minutes they give me a sore spot on the top of my head. I have tried adjusting numerous times to no avail. I emailed Ultrasone and received an initial response, telling me to bend the top band. I have done this over and over and the pain persists when I wear them for long periods. My return period has expired, and now Ultrasone won't respond to my emails. I will update if they are able to help me.
customer_reviews.author: W. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but can be uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'll make this pretty quick since there are so many reviews here to read. PRO- Absolutely phenomenal sound. I am not an audiophile but every part of the sound is spectacular in my opinion. Cannot rave enough about the sound quality. CON- They can be quite uncomfortable. If you are just going to be sitting at a computer wearing these, they might work for you (although be weary after an hour or two they can start to hurt). If you are going to be active I would not recommend. All in all I'm not disappointed in these headphones but if I had to redo this purchase I'd probably go with something comparable that had better comfort.
customer_reviews.author: dnertun

customer_reviews.title: nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: sound is on the bright side, punchy bass. They do get warm if you wear them for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Wally Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth and detailed sound without massively thumping bass or dentist drill midrange peaks. The sound is incredibly detailed with very tight bass control. These really shine with modern, well produced content, and play very loudly. With a good source and well recorded content it sounds like you are actually there.
customer_reviews.author: Elwood

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: My ever amazing wife got me these as a birthday gift and I am continually impressed with the quality. I am still working on my "Burn In" as mentioned by others but so far it has been an amazing experience. They are a tad bulky on your head but I figure who cares if you arent using them for workouts or other such activities.
customer_reviews.author: Finious

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound amazing. As a disclaimer, I am not an audiofile, and these are just the second expensive headphones I have owned, the other being a set of Turtle Beach headphones that I use for gaming. In any case, the Ultrasone HFI-780 provide the best sound I have ever experienced.
customer_reviews.author: L00d3r

customer_reviews.title: Hard to pin down
customer_reviews.text: On a classic jazz recording like Desxter Gordon's Ballades has a tendency to suppress the bass lines - similar issues on violin - perhaps these are best suited to rock - Also some harshness on crescendos on classical - still deciding if a product defect is the key. All listening on a top headphone amp.
customer_reviews.author: Aware

customer_reviews.title: An very fast and sharp headphone
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have a very quick and hard response. Excellent for well-designed electronic music, but it'll make s***** dubstep kill your ears. I think the S-Logic mumbo jumbo gets some of the credit for allowing the sound to be so sharp without getting too harsh on the ear. The detail takes a little getting used to. They have an awesome character, if a little unusual, but I like it. My iPhone has no problem driving these, but as always you'll get significantly better sound with a similarly priced audio source.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, price and looks
customer_reviews.text: My goal was to find a better set of headphones which will work with my iPod and home sound system. These are very loud on both devices, and are definitely worth every penny. The clarity is better than the AKG 142 I tried previously. The base is powerful but controlled, and the highs aren't annoying. It does colour in the highs and lows a tad, but it does so in a nice manner. The one gripe about these headphones is applicable with all closed-ear headphones - if you wear them for more than an hour, your ears will get hot and require a breather.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Best Hedphones I Own
customer_reviews.text: I just got these and they are AMAZING. The sound is unlike any headphone I ever have used. I own a few high end heandphones (Beats, Sennheiser HD 280, Technics Dh 1200). These surpass them all. They are super lightweight and comfortable. These can be worn for hours without any discomfort. Nice balanced sound.
customer_reviews.author: blf652

customer_reviews.title: A good value
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, comfort, and sound. Much better than my senheiser HD-280s in all three of these categories. The ear cups are plenty big to fully surround your ear without touching it, and i would not want them to be any larger like the ultrasone pro series.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to complain
customer_reviews.text: The sound of these is amazing. Materials are very high quality ones, design is simple and perfect. They are light but very resistant. And we can feel that it's DJ headphone bvecause the bass is really present. I would appreciate a better balance between the bass and the treebles/meds. Don't worry it's not aweful! But after hours of listening electro music it's getting heavy! So far my best headphones. I would never change my mind to get these!
customer_reviews.author: angamandi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and sound.
customer_reviews.text: Built well and comfortable to wear, sound quality very good.
customer_reviews.author: CRL

customer_reviews.title: Ultrasone HFI-780
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an expert. But I will say that these are very good headphones. The only difficulty initially has been tempering a high pitch to voices and electric guitars when watching movies and concerts. I have gotten mostly around that by adjusting the definition, focus, 6kHz, and 10kHz settings on my beats audio equalizer. In my opinion, these headphones sound better than other headphones I tried and returned that were at least $50 more. Allow at least a few weeks for a break in period as well as time to finding the right settings on the equalizer as the unit breaks in.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great Headphones and shipping was good . The only downside, for people with not much headphone experience like me, is that it takes a lot of hours to burn for these headphones to reach their max potential.
customer_reviews.author: Gary  You

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely some really good headphones. Highly worth the buy. I’m not one to leave reviews much, but these sets deserve five stars.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound.
customer_reviews.text: These were the best pair of cans I ever heard. However, the hfi 580 sound near as good for 40 less. I love the short cable and line extender that comes with this set though.
customer_reviews.author: Selluminis

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Aweful Headaches
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any issues with the sound for these. The only issues that I have is how tight they are on your head. I have put a good 50+ hours of listening time into them, and it doesn't seem to have changed. I can generally wear them for 1-2 hours before I need to take them off. Not only does it clamp tight, but they make my ears really hot. I absolutely love the sound that comes out of them, but I'm irritated that I can't listen to them long enough to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Have been using them for a year. Clear, good range and seperation. I use them for music and movies on my tablet. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great head phones from Germany!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy when I have received these amazing head phones. Excellent sound quality, very convenient to wear them. Outstanding performance, highly recommend for everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Sergei Makarov

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: For someone who enjoys the sound, I recommend it without any restrictions. For both, films, and music, especially if you like rock and jazz ...
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Basilides Pascual

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Dollar for dollar, these are the best I have tried. They have a long cord and are really comfortable on the ears.
customer_reviews.author: MDH

customer_reviews.title: Great clean sound
customer_reviews.text: I use these with my Rotel amp to listen to my ultra high quality Cds
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J. Malinak Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can blast my music right next to my co-worker and he can't hear a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Goltermann

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of headphones, they are a must
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing. They are very comfortable, have incredible sound, and my favorite feature is having the same perceived loudness but reducing fatigue. After a month of use I have yet to find any cons.
customer_reviews.author: F Wild

customer_reviews.title: Rich, crisp sound, great headphones.
customer_reviews.text: These are the absolute best headphones I have ever had. The sound is crisp and clean. Rich with detail I have never experienced on other headphones.
customer_reviews.author: R. Beason

customer_reviews.title: Simply Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to back up the other, positive, in-depth reviews. Just received the headphones a day or two ago and the performance is excellent. Great sound, feel good on my head, may look a bit goofy but once the music is on I could care-less, the quality is phenomenal. I am completely satisfied, money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality !
customer_reviews.text: I own a pair of Sony MDR-7506 and this one . Personally speaking , I prefer MDR-7506 for movie or animation . However , I would recommend this for music . It does worth the original price . However , if you can get it at around 150 with shipping , just go and get a pair !
customer_reviews.author: Kurz

customer_reviews.title: Very natural sound, smooth and love to music for hours.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is so pure, bass is extremely smooth and deep. I have tried several headphones but therse are the best headphones I have ever used. You can listen to music for hours and also they are very comfortable to wear. Every pinch of music can be heard and I really like to hear for long hours.
customer_reviews.author: kumar

customer_reviews.title: Unmatched
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and balanced. Extra long cord, great to get lost in your favorite album or on a long flight, very nice.
customer_reviews.author: 1of1

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality lives up to everything I could ask for, and the cups are extremely comfortable. I can wear them all day without getting a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Budda Belly

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Definitely was excited for these but when I got them the build quality was different then what I thought it would be, the sound is there & sounds decent but what you'll have to get used is their sound design in their cups that are like a diamond shape which projects the sound into your ears, but for me it just doesn't get the job done .. You don't feel the music & the sound like you should if you it was the classic design of going straight into your ears.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Headphones but can be uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are astonishing! I've heard more from my music and currently re-listening to a lot of it. I rated it 4/5 b/c the headband can be a little uncomfortable. If you can get past that though, these are amazing! I did a video review and you can view it here: [...]
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wysocki

customer_reviews.title: garbage product and poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy these. They broke after less than 3 months. The seller refuses to help, and the manufacturer is nearly impossible to contact. I will repost if they resolve the issue but am VERY dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: sarahmn

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, good price...
customer_reviews.text: Great set of headphones for the price. Havent quite finished the burn in period yet but they already sound amazing. Paired them up with a fiio e11 which definitely helps but they sound great on their own too, especially considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: sugar

customer_reviews.title: great sound but
customer_reviews.text: great sound but the cans are smaller than your ears and after 30 mins your ears hurt
customer_reviews.author: P. Pirillo

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a audiophile but I know like good sounding music. This is my first new pair of higher end headphones in many years and they are well worth the money spent. I never thought I had a large head but my one issue with theses is the tightness of the fit. Not overpowering but mildly annoying. Overall, I now spend more time listening that I have in years because of the enriched sound.
customer_reviews.author: advize

customer_reviews.title: Waw
customer_reviews.text: I think that this headphone is perfect for mixing , my ears love it :) , the bass is real , if you mix an elctronic or accustic sessions , you know what I mean , trust your ear and trust Ultrasone :))
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Talaat

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately Underwhelming
customer_reviews.text: Very nice headphones and it produces good quality music. I was searching for HiFi capabilitiy, no battery, and over the ear. I was left underwhelmed. This does not indicate the headphones are of poor quality, I was just looking for something different. For inquiring minds, I purchased the Bowers and Wilkins P 700. Sorry to the Ultrasone manufacturer/company.
customer_reviews.author: Monkish

customer_reviews.title: Ultrasone HFI 780
customer_reviews.text: The surround sound is phenomenal. It has a 3 dimensional quality that allows you feel you are in a concert hall or in the band.Amazon offered the best price and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Burns

customer_reviews.title: excellent headphones, worth $200
customer_reviews.text: Well this headphones' sound was so bad at first, but after a week's warm up it turned into a new one. With this headphones, I never use my IE8.
customer_reviews.author: fei

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Day one: Great sound out of the box. Some of the complaints I've read in audiophile forums and such seem non-existent. Update coming after the burn-in period (~150 hrs, or so I've heard).
customer_reviews.author: Arc

customer_reviews.title: it's good earphone
customer_reviews.text: the brand is old and quanlity is good ,sound it ture enviromental i like it so i recommand it to you
customer_reviews.author: gaowei

customer_reviews.title: Wow.. amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I'm totally impressed with these. Soundstage, clarity, transparency, bass.. these have it all. I've really spoiled myself with these headphones. I've purchased a LOT of high dollar high-end stereo equipment over the years , but this is the best bang for the buck I've ever spent. Very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Marc Tarr

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are really amazing headphones. You can have studio quality music from your iPod or iPad.
customer_reviews.author: steve kuhns

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome...
customer_reviews.text: This headphone is great, great sound and great price Used to have a Monster Beat and Solo HD but none of them can match up with this one, nice deal!
customer_reviews.author: yyda78

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: 10/10 best open backed headphones in the world, even better with DAC or amplifier, amazing for games even better for music
customer_reviews.author: JDornan

customer_reviews.title: Do Not buy Used
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair used from amazon warehouse. After a few weeks, the left side went out. Amazon has a great return policy though. They are amazingly simple to work with.
customer_reviews.author: NOrtiz

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound, really uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This headphones have a magnificent sound but they are really unconfortable to wear, al least for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

product_meta.title: Ultrasone HFI-780 S-Logic Surround Sound Professional Closed-back Headphones with Transport Bag
product_meta.description: The exclusive design of the closed-back Ultrasone HFI-780 is accentuated by the polar-silver color. The HFI-780 contains all Ultrasone technologies such as S-Logic Plus, ULE and safer hearing. The HFI-780 is developed from the studio sector and is distinguished by a frequency response that is specifically tuned for DVD and gaming. Sophisticated home theater and music enthusiasts are overwhelmed by the impressive sound that makes it appear as though you are listening to speakers placed meters away. Gamers are impressed by the exact sound reproduction, making the gaming world come alive. The low frequency ranges are raised in order to reach the highest possible synergies with DSP-Systems like Dolby Headphone and Yamaha Silent Cinema. Through S-Logic Natural Surround, the sound moves out of your head and into the room around you. Direction and distance are more easily perceived, giving the illusion of being at a live concert. With just a pair of Ultrasones and your favorite audio device, you can have genuine 3-dimensional aural enjoyment. The HFI-780 is equipped with thicker ear and headphone pads, and comes with a new velvet carrying bag.
feature_bullets: S-Logic Natural Surround Sound Plus. Connectivity Technology: Wireless
S-Logic Natural Surround Sound provides a more natural, lifelike sound
Advanced acoustic design reduces SPL levels to the ear drum by up to 40% (3-4dB), providing the same perceived loudness but with less fatigue
ULE technology with MU metal shielding reduces radiation by up to 98% as compared to ordinary headphones, frequency range : 10 - 26000 Hz
40mm gold-plated Mylar drivers for a rich, warm sound that is great for studio and stage use
1/8 inch gold plated plug, gold plated screw adaptor, demo CD, and carry bag included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars155 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
